footer.description: EcoDeli is an eco-friendly and collaborative delivery platform that connects clients, deliverers, merchants, and service providers.

faq.title1: How can I cancel my booking?
faq.content1: You can cancel your booking up to 24 hours before the scheduled time without any fees. After this deadline, cancellation fees may apply.
faq.title2: How can I contact the provider?
faq.content2: Once your booking is confirmed, you will be able to communicate with the provider via our secure messaging system.
faq.content3: Payment is secure and is only charged after the service is completed. You can pay by credit card or via our e-wallet.
